words.serbian: Nadam se da ćeš se dobro zabaviti!
words.english: I hope you'll have a good time!
How do you spend your free time?
How many siblings do you have?
How did you spend the weekend?
How long have you been living here?

words.serbian: Da li si već bio/la ovde?
Da li imaš neki omiljeni restoran ovde?
words.english: Do you have a favorite restaurant here?

words.serbian: Kako ti se dopada ovaj grad?
words.english: How do you like this city?

words.serbian: Da li govoriš još neke jezike?
words.english: Do you speak any other languages?
How do you deal with stress?
